example.title: Shopping Cart With UpdatePanel
example.metakeywords: php ajax, php ajax framework, php callback, ajax for php, php ajax examples, php ajax scripts, php ajax tutorial, php ajax post, php ajax toolkit
example.metadescription: KoolAjax is a great PHP Ajax Framework. This example shows you how to create a simple shopping cart with KoolAjax's UpdatePanel. You can add and remove products without refreshing page.
example.description: The example shows you how to create a simple shopping cart with KoolAjax's UpdatePanel. You can add and remove products without refreshing page. The cart data will be stored using session.
